A monk with this ability can spend an additional 2 ki points when using either the breaking-down koan or building-up koan ki powers. When combined with master-thought koan, breaking-down koan affects a number of characters of your choice within 30 feet equal to the monkâ€™s wisdom modifier. When combined with master-thought koan, building-up koan can be used on an ally within 30 feet.

A monk must be at least 12th level and have either the breaking-down koan or the building-up koan ki power before selecting this ki power.
